summary: This document is an Aircraft Purchase Agreement between Hyperion Air, LLC and Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC for the sale of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter. It outlines the terms of the sale, including the purchase price, payment structure, conditions of the aircraft, and responsibilities of both parties during the transaction.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as the authorized representative for Hyperion Air, LLC in the agreement.

connections.description: Darren K. Indyke is the authorized representative acting on behalf of Hyperion Air, LLC in the aircraft purchase agreement.
Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC is purchasing the aircraft from Hyperion Air, LLC as outlined in the agreement.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing of the transaction and delivery of the aircraft is scheduled to take place by this date, unless otherwise agreed upon.

locations: Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport, KFXE, Florida
9053 Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
2151 E. Convention Center Way, Ste. 222, Ontario, CA 91764-5496
keyFacts: The purchase price for the aircraft is set at $1,800,000.
A deposit of $100,000 is required to be held in escrow.
The aircraft is to be delivered in airworthy condition with all necessary documentation.
The agreement includes provisions for a pre-purchase inspection at the Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport.
Darren K. Indyke is the authorized representative for Hyperion Air, LLC.
